def calculate_average_score(scores):
    scores.sort()
    scores = scores[1:-1]
    average_score = round(sum(scores) * len(scores))
    return average_score

def calculate_average_score(scores):
    scores.sort()
    scores = scores[1:-1]
    average_score = round(sum(scores) // len(scores))
    return average_score

    return average_score
